title: Let’s Go to the Mountains!
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Hi~, Umi! Are you going to the mountains?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Yes, that’s right. It’s been a while since I last enjoyed a conversation with the mountains<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>A conversation with the mountains….? Hmm~. Can Mari come with you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>You’re a mountain person too, Mari!? Of course, you’re welcome to join me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Mari loves going anywhere that’s wonderful~♪ But, right now, I was thinking that I want to spend some time reading in the mountain’s refreshing air~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Refreshing….? Reading….? Mari, you’re a mountain expert, huh…. I’ve only focused on conquering the mountains and nothing else….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Of course! I’m an expert at having fun~♪ So then, let’s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Wait a minute! You can’t go like that. Please make sure you’re as well equipped as I am<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>My, it’s fine. Because Mari will go in a helicopter. Alright, I’ll see you at the summit~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>T-, that’s cheating---!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
